thread.section_title: Goldmoney.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldmoney.com | www.goldmoney.com
thread.title: Віталій

author: Віталій
title: Віталій
text:
После заказа мастеркард , в течении часа заблокировали аккаунт. Не советую никому с этим сайтом связываться! Написали вот это!
Hello Віталій,
Your Goldmoney Prepaid MasterCard application has been unsuccessful.
Please Contact Support to resolve this issue.
Please contact our Customer Success team at any time. We are happy to answer any question you may have.
Kind regards,
The Goldmoney Team
А потом заблокировали аккаунт и написали вот это!
Your Account Has Been Suspended
Hello Віталій,
Please note your account has been suspended. Should you wish to reinstate your account, please contact our Support Team to discuss and/or resolve the following issue:
Please Contact Support to have the matter resolved.
Thank you and we apologize for any inconvenience.
Contact Support
Kind regards,
The Goldmoney Team
